explains: adj. 贫乏的；瘦的；（数量）少的，不足的

sentences.en: It's difficult to raise a family on a meager income.
sentences.cn: 依靠微薄的收入是很难养家的。

sentences.en: During their six- to twelve-week voyage, they subsisted on meager rations.
sentences.cn: 在六到十二周的航行中，他们靠微薄的口粮维持生活。

sentences.en: Members of poor peasant families spun or wove cloth and linens at home for scant remuneration in an attempt to supplement meager family income.
sentences.cn: 贫穷农民家庭的成员在家纺织布和亚麻以挣得很少的报酬，弥补微薄的家庭收入。
